pages.title: Southern King Crab
pages.text: Lithodes santolla, also known as the southern king crab, king crab or centolla, is a species of king crab, found off southern South America including the Falklands/Malvinas.$(br2)In Chile, it mostly lives at depths to 150 m ($(o)490 ft$()), but south of 40° S it has been found at 600 m ($(o)2,000 ft).

pages.title: Southern King Crab
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:cod$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: None Days
